definitions.definition: A person confined to an institution such as a prison (as a convict ) or hospital (as a patient ).
A person who shares a residence (such as a hotel guest , a lodger , or a student living on campus ), or other place .
Synonym of passenger , a person held or riding within a vehicle .

main_definition: A person confined to an institution such as a prison (as a convict ) or hospital (as a patient ).
secondary_definitions: A person who shares a residence (such as a hotel guest , a lodger , or a student living on campus ), or other place .
( uncommon ) Synonym of passenger , a person held or riding within a vehicle .
